org.joty.access

Class Accessor.DataDef

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joty.access.Accessor.DataDef
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Accessor.PanelDataDef
    Enclosing class:
    Accessor

    public class Accessor.DataDef
extends java.lang.Object
    The core inner class for the definition and the retrieving of an sql statement capable to support context parameters, the value of which is resolved either at the store time of the statement definition or at the statement execution time.
    See Also:
    Accessor.DataDef.ParamHolder

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Accessor.DataDef.ParamHolder
      An instance of this class holds the value or the way to get the value of a context parameter.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • addContextParamName

        public void addContextParamName(java.lang.String name)
        Allows to add an addressable by name param context holder.

        the order by which it is called must respect the position of the corresponding place holder in the target sqlExpression. To identify the call order participate all the following methods: addContextParamName(java.lang.String), addParamActuator(org.joty.access.Accessor.ParamActuator), addParamValue(java.lang.String), that is, any call of this methods makes the order to increment: the next call will define a param holder associated to the next place holder in the sql statement.

      • addParamActuator

        public void addParamActuator(Accessor.ParamActuator paramActuator)
        Adds a param context holder object and provides its value actuator implementation to be stored.

        see addContextParamName(String) for a rule for calling this method

      • addParamValue

        public void addParamValue(java.lang.String value)
        Adds a param context holder object and provides its value to be stored: it requires the observance of the position correspondence in the sqlExpression

        see addContextParamName(String) for a rule for calling this method

      • getSearchSql
